title: Broadway 3BR Apartment
text:
Oh my goodness! Where do I begin? We arrived around 6:30 pm, after a 10 minute drive from Boston Logan Airport to the charming area of Revere. The entry details sent to us by the hosts were perfect! 
Upon entering the building, we knew that we were in a special apartment. The apartment is exceptionally beautiful. Everything has been renovated to the highest caliber. The beds are all three like sleeping on clouds. 
Although, we were here only one night, prior to a flight to Newfoundland, we could have all spent a week. The restaurants in the area are great & so reasonably priced. We ate at Diâ€™Parma, 2 blocks away. Fantastic fresh swordfish & risotto. Great house bottles of vino for $17 USD. 
Whenever I am back in Boston, this is where I will stay. I would give this 100 stars if possible. Thank you Erik & Linda for allowing us to stay in your beautiful apartment. ğŸ˜ƒğŸ¥°

title: the BOOKING APP
text: I did find some cheap motels in Savannah Ga at the last minute, and they were very cheap. But is was so far from Tybee Island. We stayed at the Baymount Hotel on 2 Lee Blvd, Savannah Ga. the room was for Thursday-Saturday. We did get a good rate. That was the only thing good about it. The room was very clean but very small for a family of 5. The pool was dirty and warm. Almost like it was a heated pool. And I kept asking why it doesnâ€™t look like itâ€™s been chlorinated, but they finally cleaned the pool on our last day there. And we could finally see our feet in the pool. And on this Booking app. It said hot breakfast served every morning. But when we woke up to eat. There was only muffins, bananas and yogurt, and coffee. I asked tje concierge and she said that since the virus they donâ€™t serve hot breakfast. I asked why that wasnâ€™t labeled on the website. But she couldnâ€™t answer me. So our stay was ok. But it wasnâ€™t the best Iâ€™ve had.

title: Comfortable stay!
text:
The room was very well appointed and comfortable. We messaged the property before and during our stay with Lilla who was incredibly communicative and kind. She even recommended a restaurant we thoroughly enjoyed and watched a dance festival as she had informed us of while we dined! The bedroom was wonderful and even had an ivy hanging plant! The bathroom shower pressure was strong which we appreciated and detachable. The toilet was in a separate little room apart from the shower and sink. Breakfast was also good and equipped with self serve coffee machine (several variety options). Lilla greeted us with individual breakfast plates adorned with select salami, ham, fresh vegetables and a variety of cheese.

The private parking lot had a key that was supplied to us along with a house key and room key. 

We really enjoyed our stay.

title: Booking is (mostly) easy, Everything after is a nightmare
text:
Iâ€™ve used several different apps/sites for booking travel & trips over the years. The initial booking travel was mostly easy. However, every issue or communication after that was a nightmare. 
It took several attempts to address/resolve any concerns or inquiries about our upcoming trip. A lot of back n forth (most of it me sending multiple messages to get a real response-not automated) with minimal answers, that which took several days to finally get a conclusion/resolution. 
Two times we were even charged for things that we still have not received a reason or reimbursement for, even after multiple inquiries thru messages within app and emails.
First one, upon booking we were charged more than the agreed (and authorized) amount. Booking denied the additional amount charged, but my bank statement reflected otherwise. 
Second one, came after our trip. No emails or messages, but a charge to my bank account (even tho I had previously removed it from the app due to the previous charge issue). No one could give us a reason, and when I requested a refund since there was no reason, the lines of communication stopped each time weâ€™d reach that point. I went thru this multiple times, each hitting the same dead end.

Youâ€™re not really saving much (if any) $$$ with this app, so I recommend avoiding the headache all together. Save yourself the B*llsh*t.

title: Mr.
text: The staff is so helpful and understanding.  I had read all the reviews about the king size handicapped room on the 2nd floor next to the elevator. That is the room we have.  For us, itâ€™s not too loud, but we are here in late April.  I do wish like others have said that it had a view of anything other than a wall.  But it is what it is. Iâ€™m much more into the comfort of the room.  Our room is clean, although, they do skimp on the toilet paper.  I shall have to request more.  We donâ€™t use the amenities that the hotel offers.  We donâ€™t swim or go to a gym.  We also donâ€™t have have young children of any age.  We have come to Reno to watch grass and trees grow somewhere.  Anything other we say would be unfair because we have just spent our 1st night here.  I donâ€™t expect anything to happen negatively here that canâ€™t be fixed.

title: Modern and quiet
text:
We spent a week here and mostly just to rest it was quiet even know they're doing construction across the street and the room was nice and dark for sleeping on the air conditioning worked extremely well maybe too well.  
Staff is very accommodating and kind-
You're within a five minute walk of the Times Square mall which is a great place to go for food on the lower level.
also if you want to cross over where the monorail is a few blocks up there's a night Street market with tons of food and also the fancier Fahrenheit 88 mall and promenade.
Personally I like the hotel but the street that it was on was off the beaten path and it could be a little scary for women traveling alone I would not recommend it.  However I was always with my husband and never felt unsafe at any time.
they have some fun theme rooms like the Beatles room in Marilyn Monroe room or the Elvis Presley room we actually stayed in the Beatles room for the first night and it was adorable.  
Breakfast was included but I'm not much of a breakfast person so I only saw one time and it was limited.
Our favorite place was as you approach the Fahrenheit 88 mall there are some Japanese and Chinese letterings we found it on the last night and it's a massive food court with everything from Japan or Hong Kong.  
He was a nice stay and the price was right.

title: Amazing service -above and beyond
text: I canâ€™t say enough about the great hospitality.  Our flight arrived early.  Hotel staff was very accommodating to our needs and helped us checkin a little early.  They also provided a place for us to keep our luggage until our room was ready.  We left our phone in the taxis and the hotel staff tracked us down to return our phone.  Amazing!!!  They were more than willing to help us with anything we needed.  They were very friendly and helpful. The hotel rooms were much larger than I expected.  We were able to stretch out get comfortable.  They even had a small kitchen with a fridge and microwave.  I wouldnâ€™t call this a hotel room it was more like an apartment!  Great stay.  I would not hesitate to stay there again

title: Read before you book! Your trip depends on it!!!
text:
You get what you pay for... the first room I had because I did ask for a new room had a cracked and pealing ceiling, dark, and the furniture was so old and rocky, like a table that needed adjustments, the phone had some sort of interference that projected a high pitched screeching noise and rocky. That room needed a complete make over. So I get my new room in the â€œnewâ€ tower... the carpets getting there needed to be stretched like a low budget carpet company put them in. As you get off the elevator to the 22nd floor it smelled like sewage every day I was there which is gross. By the way so does the pool area that was half open. The bathroom in this new room is missing finishing touches the alarm clock is out of the 90s and the phone didnâ€™t work in this room either.  I wonâ€™t ever go back unless I go a nice free room to change my thinking...

Which is why the saying â€œyou get what you pay forâ€ is true in this case. I would have rather payed the extra $200 and stayed in the Aria like I did last time and been a lot happier.

title: Super simple to use, but one suggestion for app devs
text:
Downloaded for US cross country road trip. Used everyday so far, now going on day 7. Very easy to search, read reviews by category, apply filters for specific needs (pet friendly, free cancellation, etc) and book. Saves billing info for easy reservations across pretty much all hotel/motel chains. Super simple to use.

One suggestion, if Bookings had its own rewards program, it would likely gain more market share as many of the chains have their own rewards programs that incentivize using their app instead. For budget travelers like me, Bookings is easier to use in finding the cheapest deals across chains, so having an umbrella â€œrewardsâ€ or points system through Bookings that could apply to all stays regardless of the hotel chain would be awesome.

title: TERRIBLE!!!
text: So I read reviews making sure that it was a nice place to stay at and how close it is to the stadium. We asked if we could check in about an 1hr early and which they replied with no because they are cleaning which I understood,  BUT when it was check in time we couldnâ€™t even get our keys because of the key knob machine wasnâ€™t working properly. Other people had issues getting their keys too, and a lady even asked if she was supposed to get a garage key because she was missing hers. When we walked into our room the AC was busted! And there was stains in the wall, in the closet there was a bed that had hot Cheetos stains and when we called saying the AC wasnâ€™t working they said they would send someone down and it has been an 1hr and half with ni ac and we had plans to go to an event we called back and they didnâ€™t have an Idea on what to do. Luckily I called booking to please help us get a refund because it was so ridiculous. Like if they were â€œcleaningâ€ they should have known the AC was busted

title: LOVED IT
text:
I must say my Husband and I checked in for 2 nights we watched the fireworks Fatherâ€™s Day weekend it was beautiful I will be back I would never check in the Days inn again with there nasty slippery floors I like carpet the microwave wouldnâ€™t even reach the socket at the days inn plus they tried to film flam us and said the towels was missing who on earth would steal dirty towels the supervisor fired the guy who lied and gave us our $100 deposit back I called the police got a report I was hurt to the pit of my stomach you donâ€™t lie on me and my Husband we have plenty of money to travel with and if I was a thief why would I take dirty towels and not the iron or the blow dryer pillows and ironing board they was looking for an excuse to keep our deposit and it didnâ€™t WORK Iâ€™m fine Hear at the Super 8 its way much COMFORTABLE 

BLESS THE OWNER WHO RENOVATED THIS HOTEL YOU'VE DONE AN AMAZING JOB 
MR&MRS JOHNSON

title: The heart of The heart of Athens
text:
My sister and I stayed at the Metropolis Hotel. It was our first hotel and we had a wonderful experience. It seems that thereâ€™s a parade every weekend and that occurred during our check-in; the host were friendly and kind, even joking that the parade was only for us. Our room was to be as expected, it had all the necessities. We had a view of the Acropolis and the Metropolis from our balcony. The next morning we ate the buffet breakfast and Ina (spelling may be incorrect) was lovely; she made a lovely omelette for us while we enjoyed the view of the Acropolis above the hustle and bustle of the town. It was so nice to find our â€˜homeâ€™ for the night and we couldnâ€™t have asked for better kindness and hospitality from our host. 

efcharistÃ³
Thank you!

title: My stay was wonderful
text: I cannot put into enough words how amazed I am with this hotel. They made sure we had everything we absolutely needed. BUT the icing on the cake was they were sooo friendly and fantastic. Every single morning my children went downstairs with us and would say â€œGood morningâ€ and the staff didnâ€™t hesitate one bit to say it back at all. My daughter also ended up having a fever that spiked to 106 and the staff immediately dropped everything they were doing and called 911 and got an ambulance to us fast as possible. They checked on her daily and made sure we were okay too. I will be returning for a trip in June and I will be coming right back to this hotel. I absolutely highly recommend this hotel to everyone.

title: Three stars
text:
When I initially got the app (about 6 years ago) I was very pleased with the recommendations and found that the reviews and ratings were quite accurate. I was also happy with how easy the app was to use. Notice I said WAS. 
Now, not so much. For some reason, I am unable to do a general city search; it wants to only search for what is closest to me. 
Most importantly, many user reviews of properties state peoples personal experiences and not specific to the amenities, facilities, staff and services. And I suspect someone has been editing out the negative comments. 
We stayed at a property three years ago with a high star rating and glowing reviews, but when we got there, it was a run down motel 50 yards from a freeway. They required a $200 deposit - even with a credit card, worn out carpeting, an AC unit that had to be beaten before it would cough out coolish air, if it blew any air at all, no hot water and spotty wi-fi. 
I have been reading reviews online and comparing those to reviews on Booking and they are not even close: 2 weeks ago people have began complaining about bedbugs and roaches at one property, while no mention of such nastiness is made on Booking where the reviews are still all positive.
I will try the update and see if that fixes the functionality of the app and continue researching online reviews/ratings.

title: Great app but...
text: I have been using booking for many years now and travel so often that I'm always getting rewards. I love that I get the genius discounts! They save me so much money. That being said, I wish they'd add a feature for "oversized vehicle parking" or tall vehicle parking and "hot water" on the amenities. The vehicle I drive right now doesn't fit in most apartment complex underground parking and I waste a lot of time google searching and contacting the building directly only to find out my car won't fit.  Also, traveling in less developed nations, many places don't offer hot water because it's a luxury. Also, the more you browse, it seems the algorithm tracks your search and will raise the price if you don't book in that same session.

title: Nice place but needs some updating
text: The customer service is the best. They treat you like royalty. That being said, the place needs some updating. They tile in the shower is cute but shower curtain didnâ€™t go with th decor. The floors are sold and need to be replaced. The furniture in the room and lobby is very dirty and outdated. The pictures that are on the website are not true to the hotel. Hated the art work in our room. It looked like graffiti so we took it down during our stay and it made the room more acceptable. It was very noisy. We had a balcony and you can hear the rain and people taking and the wind. The halls were noisy and you can hear everything so not a lot of privacy. No elevator with so you have to walk those stairs! But absolutely loved the rooftop. Had a small pool and lounge chairs that we took advantage while there because beach is hard to get to in Old San Juan.

title: Love it ! Highly recommend
text:
It was lovely to live there ! We arrived a little bit late , but the boss was so nice , even itâ€™s late, he introduced us where the swimming pool and the kitchen and where we could have breakfast! Heâ€™s so nice ! And after we slept, we reminded that we need to get up early next morning so we can leave for the Xcaret Park early, but we have no idea where to take the bus and everything, so we have to wake him up , heâ€™s so patient and helpful , and even helped us search for the bus routines so we could know when we can catch the latest bus back home ! Totally nice experience stay with them ! And the other day , his wife is also sooo nice ,cook us the breakfast and call the taxi for us . 
Highly recommend stay with them if you need to stay in Cancun! Lovely place and friendly host!

title: Best stay ever! Olive Garden
text: Everything in the Vila is absolutely gorgeous. I was blown away from the moment I pulled up to the gate. There is free parking which is extremely convenient- it doesnâ€™t seem like there is any other parking in Petrovac so that is a huge savings of time and headaches! The terrace was the perfect place to have espresso and they had a cute little Lavazza machine to make it! The view is stunning. The apartment is spotless, 15 out of 10 on cleanliness! Sasha, NataÅ¡a, and Lidija were all so warm and welcoming. I really canâ€™t say enough good things about this place. The backyard is extremely peaceful as well. I will certainly be back here for my next stay and highly highly recommend it to anyone who wants great hospitality, their own privacy, and a clean place to rest.

title: Unfortunate
text:
When we booked I didnâ€™t realize it was a non changeable reservation. My wife fell and broke her hip & needed more time to recover. I talked with the Golden Prague Room directly & they were firm on there policy so we couldnâ€™t go therefore being the room was paid for in advance I felt it wasnâ€™t necessary for me to cancel the reservation, I didnâ€™t feel it was necessary because they could of rebooked the room and make more money on my dime so we were just a no show. 
Iâ€™m not blaming the Golden Prague Room, policy is policy & it looked like a great place to stay for the location. I just didnâ€™t see that it was a non changeable reservation. Now that we are in our late 70s I seriously doubt we will do anymore European vacations & with COVID-19 at our age being more accessible to catching this virus itâ€™s made it a game changer for us.

title: HOTEL TRAMONTO
text:
Nestled on the beautiful Vlore beachfront,( really a beachfront, the light blue waters are literally right outside your room)!!Tramonto is absolutely fantastic from the second you arrive. Itâ€™s a boutique hotel rooted on customer
Service and its brand new!! Sergio is there for every little request. The owner Vaso, is present at all times and the staff from the cafe to cleaning to beach chairs are impeccable!  I mean the staff is helping my 7 year old with his floaties. We enjoyed a 3 day stay with 3 kids and were really impressed on how well and respectful this place treats its guests. Their Waiver runners, private boat will add some awesome activities. We have stayed and been many places however our experience here was second to none!!Will definitely be back and recommend!

title: Bed bugs
text: I have stayed in dozens of hotels. This is the first time I ever encounter bed bugs. It was literally on the bed crawling around. We called the front desk repeatedly to get the person working to come. They didnâ€™t answer so we grabbed our things and told her there was a bug in our room. She asked if it was a stink bug, I said no and asked if she would come to the room. She went into the room and saw it immediately. She apologized and said she would move us.  We were about to leave the room when she turned back and said let me get it before it spreads. We then went to the front desk where she was bombarded by phone calls and proceeded to say  she would move us. While she was on the phone we talked to each other and decided no way. We told her we didnâ€™t want that we wanted a refund because we have children in our home. She then asked if we wanted one of the new unused rooms. We repeated no and she said we would get a refund once we spoke to the manager the next day. Itâ€™s been five days and no call back.

title: Hotel Review
text: Everything was wonderful from the staff to the rooms. The food was amazing as well. The only reason I am rating a four is because at the party pool the bartender would only attend to you if you gave him a tip. If not he would totally ignore you. Also when asked about a specific liquor he would say there wasnâ€™t anymore. For example we asked for Don Julio Reposado that we clearly seen when he opened it to give us a shot. Later he said there was nomore. I have been to many all inclusives and have never had a experience with such a rude bartender who only serves you if you show him money. The whole point of a all inclusive hotel is to get food and drinks when you want. Other than that the hotel is beautiful with many pools and the rest of the staff is wonderful.

title: Wonderful time
text: I was in room 1828 every morning for breakfast. I saw the big beautiful smile always willing to help me. She knew my drink was carrot juice and she was there right away with it. Her name is. Samch Zaki she got me all the foods to eat. She found out what I like and help me with it, I cannot think her enough and I truly appreciate her patience with me. I want to dinner on my last day that was May 20 and I had a young man that helped me again extremely patient as well. His name is. And Sayed call Mark I donâ€™t know if they supply or not to service. But the piano man, may the meal taste better feel better and look better. His magical  keys always kept the room full of calm and beautiful and soft music. I wish I knew his name so I could put it on here as well.

title: Nice Hotel close to all attractions
text:
We stayed at this property last week for 6 days.  The rooms were comfortable and clean.  The breakfast had a good selection and totaled the selections every couple of days.
So now off to the down side.  The parking is ridiculous.  I would suggest parking at Ace that the corner of 6th and K St. it is a 3 minute walk and we had no problems.  The most we paid was $19 for the weekend but most of the time is $14.  Way better than $60/night.  
Secondly, our rooms were supposed to be cleaned every other day - it was more like every 5 days.  The trash was filling up and we needed new towels but the housekeeping staff still didnâ€™t come. 
Also noise on the weekends was very annoying.  During the week, it was nice and quiet  but got very loud on the weekends
Overall this was a nice hotel and the locations was great.  I might stay here again.

title: A travelers dream
text: I travel A LOT for both business and pleasure.  This is MY FAVORITE app for booking hotels.  It's always the cheapest. The rates always go down.  It's easy to make special requests.  You can sync it to multiple devices or send and share a booking with other people. You can add booking details to your iPhone Passbook or to your Photo album.  It has a pay later option. The customer service is wonderful. They will send you maps and things to do in the area etc. everything about it is perfect. Recently because I book so often with them they upgraded me to the genius account which means I get up to 30% off a lot of hotels.  I had a hotel booked in nYc for $1340----they upgraded me and reduced my price to $901!  Hello thank you!  Use this app!

title: Best stay !!!
text:
After a very long ride & very hot Journey, arriving to Salamanca, wasnâ€™t little Taskâ€¦
TAo ( my 6 kg Havanese Bichon ) & I were spoiled from the moment We arrive w thÃ© Loveliness from Evaâ€™s, Our Host waiting still for Usâ€¦
As Late as We were !
Parking was a must & a great reassurance as We were way too packed, from shopping our Journey awayâ€¦
A lovely delicious bottle of wine awaiting in a spotless Suite which was so well appointed for Our Stay â€¦
We got a eat a very very late dinner less then a block away after a most difficult choice picking oneâ€¦
The car less caminos around the cathedral were full of Families & Friends enjoying the night out !
It was delightful as Was the incredible Black Ink Calamare Risotto & Wine I dinned on !
 Breakfast was served by a warm hearted kind woman & I enjoyed her morning cheers !
Wish We would planned better for a longer stay but Next Time We are ! 
Ã€ superbe Historical City !
Thank you Javier whom sent us on our way by bringing my Lola ( Mini Cooper ) up to the front of the hotel & gave us excellent direction to send us on our way to our next stay â€¦
Still got lost as the way went on but then It wouldnâ€™t be an adventure ! 
THANK YOU FOR YOUR WARM WELCOME !

title: Worst ever!
text: I have had 2 experiences that have been horrible with booking. 1st - booking sold me a flight that did not exist. Imagine arriving at the airport with 5 people for a flight that did not exist. Flight was from Rochester NY to San Diego. In order to actually get a flight I had to rent a car and drive to DC, 6 hours. Airline worked with me. Booking told me there was nothing they could do. I had the receipt, flight timesâ€¦etc. Booking messed up. 2nd - they will not refund me for a rental car that was not picked up. We arrived late due to flight delays. Car company at the airport closed at 11:00pm. We arrived after 11:00pm. Nowhere was this made known to me and booking thought that I could just call while I was in the air. Had to rent from a different company and Booking will not refund me for the first rental when nobody from the rental company was even at the airport. Booking expected me to wait around the airport until 7:00am the following day to get the rental. Do Not use this company.

title: Terrible service
text:
1. Itâ€™s terrible service,I used before, but no anymore We came to Vegas to birthday party Room price for night with fees was 209$ We add one more day for 79$ with all fees and taxes When we get our hotel with great party mood, we were informed that they charged us not 79$ for second night, but double!!!!!!  So we paid 418$ instead of 288$ Hotel show us that they charge 288$ and the rest is booking charge We call booking,they donâ€™t wanna help us, and offer us two ways: 1. Just to check in for this price or 2. To pay 170$ for cancellation What???? Hotel told us,that booking always has this problems So we staying in hotel lobby more than hour without any party mood and charged double Cause representative in booking donâ€™t wanna believe us that price was 79$ What we have to do? To make screenshots and take a video for all time using their app to approve them that we reserved for price they changed????? The worst experience I had in all our travelings Will never use this app anymore

2. Half year later we decide to use booking one more time,we reserve king bed room with ocean view
Week before we came,we knew that we have 2 queen beds with city view 
Hotel told us this time too that this is booking problem
Now they told us that prices was updated and if we want to get room we reserved, we have to pay 100$ extra or go to the room which we didnâ€™t choose

title: Nice and clean, butâ€¦.
text: The Double Tree is a very clean and it is very nice but a few things I didnâ€™t care for. We had a room with a balcony that was viewing into the atrium of the hotel. The doors do not open and they where locked shut. Without windows, the room didnâ€™t feel as cozy as it did claustrophobic. They also require a credit or debit card on file after check in and they will put a $75 pending charge on your account until you check out to cover any possible room damages.  The pending charge wasnâ€™t the problem, it was the fact that we wasnâ€™t told about the amount just that â€œwe need a card on file in the event something is damaged.â€ The thing that got me the most is I paid $300 for this room for the night and then to be charged an additional $25 to park my car over night is a bit ridiculous.

title: Nafpaktos Luxury Suites
text: Nafpaktos Luxury Suites the best place to be! The owner Stefanos was so incredibly welcoming, very friendly, and made us feel so comfortable from our arrival to departure. The owner guided us and recommended places to eat! The location is easily accessible with secure off street parking. You are walking distance from the beach- Gripovo and Psani. The place was absolutely beautiful inside! Newly renovated, impeccably clean, with modern decor, the  place was very relaxing and quiet! The facility had everything you may need! The bathroom, bedroom, and kitchen were all spotless!!! Another plus to this location is that you are walking distance to all the shops and restaurants in town, and even walking distance to the castle! We definitely recommend this place!

title: Amazing place
text: This little apartment is very special as is the family that rents it out. First of all, the price is perfect. Next, itâ€™s clean, new, spacious and adorable. What a surprise to open the door from this ancient piazetta and neighborhood outside to find this beautiful gem. We are so comfortable here, we will not want to leave. The family has been very generous to leave everything you might need during your stayâ€¦.coffee, olive oil, jelly, pots and pans,  crackers, laundry supplies. â€¦.I could go on and on. Did I mention itâ€™s quiet here!  How is that possible in this noisy city. And also we are walking distance to many major sites and a few good restaurants. Convenient parking right by the door!  Itâ€™s an amazing place. You will love it Iâ€™m sure.

title: One of my favorite hotels! We will be back!
text: The staff was amazing  and offered 1st class service. It was our anniversary and they gave a very sweet, warm welcome with a lovely platter of sweets. They also upgraded us to a nicer room with no extra charge. I love how they came and cleaned our room 2x and left a couple of small boxes filled with, delicious, perfectly sized chocolate with nuts. The breakfast was great and you could even order something customized. The room was very spacious. The hotel was very trendy showing a very eclectic array of fashion. The only downfall is that they needed more than 1 bartender for the bar because only 1 could not keep up with the demand. However the drinks were lovely.  Thank you so much for taking care of us! You guys are amazing!!!

title: Hotel O- great stay
text:
So we booked this place months ago but after reading reviews I was really second guessing my decision. I had contacted the hotel a few times by phone or email and they always answered me in return. I requested a downstairs room with handicap accessible which they honored my request upon arrival. The staff is amazing from the front desk to the two gentlemen walking around fixing things and making sure all guest are accommodated. The maid did an awesome job cleaning the room and getting us whatever we needed each day. After staying here 8 days they sure did change my mind about second guessing my decision, it was a good choice and Iâ€™m very pleased with our stay and the sincerity of the staff. 
Denise Lilly Sept. 2021

title: Booking is terrible company
text: Booking is helping the hotel to scam customer and themself do it in purpose, i booked a room on booking. Com and then when i showed up at the property, rhe room was terrible, smell so bad and poor condition that i couldn't stay there , and in the midle of the night after landing i had to look around for the new hotel for myself, they took my money when i booked a room at their website, and then when i contacted to to get my money back they refused me, by hang up in the midle of the call to connecting the other company over my booking,  because they said  that i have to talk to other company bald blad but in the email i booked its show nothing but their contact information, they tried to find the ways to scam my money by bringing up multiple company over my booking but give me no any contact of whatever company they talked about (weird no name really). Which i had to contact my bank to take my money back, horrible.

title: Not right...
text:
I called earlier this afternoon to make a reservation for tonight.  They said they were booked full.  Couple hours later, I tried on line and got a room but at a much, much higher rate.  Very unfair way of doing business and a strange way to build customer loyalty.  

I also wanted to enter a comment about how they rent rooms (terrible).  I had to enter a nickname to do it.  I used my first name and initial of last name and a pop up message said that nickname was already used.  I also entered both my initials and that got rejected, too.  I then entered â€˜Unhappy Customerâ€™ and the same thing happened.  Iâ€™m going to raise my scoring from One Star to Two Stars and keep going till it gets accepted.  If this post appears online, itâ€™s because it wonâ€™t accept lower ratings!

title: The Best
text: Iâ€™ve read a few reviews.   And now have experienced this amazing hotel and itâ€™s absolutely caring and customer centric staff. Letâ€™s start Allan, who saw that I was so touched by the room I was given he gave me a good hug and let me know the entire staff would be available for anything. There was Saul, Antonio, Luis, Natale,  as with another guest, my laundry was handled for me for free. The food was over the top. Excellent Iâ€™ve never had so many great breakfast in my life and Iâ€™ve been at five star hotels throughout the US the location was phenomenal. The bad and entire room was so comfortable I could really rave about this hotel, even more, that I would be shocked if anyone could not find this place to be anything less than extraordinary.

title: Just a Wonderful Decision
text:
We absolutely loved staying here! The location is so easy to get to and convenient for our needs. The condo is on a side road right off of 179, which is the main travel road for that part of Sedona/Oak Creek. While it makes traveling super easy, itâ€™s set back enough for you to forget youâ€™re so close to a busy road. 

The condo itself was perfect; it made us feel right at home. The giant couch made the living room so inviting and having a kitchen was a great way for us to save money on meals. We loved the chairs on the patio for coffee in the morning and wine at night. I honestly donâ€™t think we couldâ€™ve hoped for anything else. Such an amazing deal for what turned out to be a priceless experience!

title: Great stay
text: Iâ€™ve stayed at this hotel on Christmas Day and stayed for two night my stay there was stress free - I was checked in by dwilso and very respectful Indian guy whom I ask for an accommodation by switching my room to an outdoor room so that Iâ€™ll be easier for me to smoke which he did because the hotel is non smoking , and my stay was bliss the room smelt like fresh paint and clean the bedding smelt fresh and the shower I wish I had definitely a bang for your buck the area was not that great but Iâ€™ve saw worst from  a 4  star hotel no stragglers walking around no one bothered me at all and Iâ€™m a female and my check out was even smoother which I was checked out by dannin I think is name was a tall African American guy very respectful hotel and would visit back

The accommodation is well located at Taxia village, which is the destination of Tulou Course B. First of all, the owener of the place and his wife were really kind and willing to help me. They did not just pick me up from Taxia bus stop from the course, but also guided me around with a kind explanation. The madam cooks well and treated me dinner! The place is calm and homey, besides clean! If you have any problem, the owner will happily help you! Also, dried bamboo shoots that dried by the owner, (which is a local dish), is sold at the accommodation. Last but not least, thank you Mr and Mrs for your kind answers to my questions!!

title: THE VERY BEST PLACE!!!!!!!
text: I stayed in Nusa Lembongan for a month on a whim. Because I came during busy season without a booking, I had to hotel jump for a while. Iâ€™ve stayed at 5 different hotels and Walet's was the very best!!! First thereâ€™s Ketutâ€¦she has become like family to me. Help with rides, where to get massages, laundry, eating, anything you want or need, she will help!!! You will find her and the other staff constantly cleaning and sweepingâ€¦the grounds are immaculate!! This gem is a lush little paradise, just off the beach, where you can relax by the pool after surf or tours. Always hot water and internet. If you want a place where you feel like youâ€™ve â€œcome homeâ€ on Nusa Lembongan, pick Waletâ€™s. Best place and best valueâ€¦everything you could ever want!!

title: Hosts, Alex and Sabrina are kind and generous
text:
We stayed for 2 nights at this cozy farm mountain home with a character. Although it was a little bit tricky finding the place, we managed to find it right right away with Sabrina's prior instructions of the direction. We were met with hospitality and kindness from our hosts. 
We want to see Liechstenstein as soon as we got there to make the most of our time. Alex and Sabrina were kind enough to let us borrowed their car. It was generous of them to do that. 
Although the place is quite old, they're able to make it presentable and comfortable. We slept very well during our two nights stay.
On our last day, Alex was kind enough to offer us a ride to Sevelen train station which is the nearest station. 
I recommend getting a train to Sevelen instead of Buchs SG which is a little further however you can always take the N400 bus to take you to Buelin at Sevelen which is a 5 min walk to the house. The bus cost us over 4 CHF to or from Buchs SG and over 2CHF to or from Sevelen.  
I recommend this place significantly because of the hosts effort who made us feel at home during our stay.

title: Thank You!
text: Let me start out with saying that Greg owner of the Aruba Motel Adam was Amazing! I had driven down on Labor Day weekend early, being that it was going to be a busy weekend with traffic, and had arrived to the motel early by 3 hours. Adam the owner was amazing and graciously checked me in to my room early without hesitation. He offered to help me in any way I need and let me know all the wonderful spots around the hotel as well if I needed any places to go and places to see. This hotel was spotless and everyone I encountered was so pleasant and the pool was like a tropical oasis! I canâ€™t say enough about this motel and definitely will be back for more summer fun! Thank you Adam for your hospitality! I recommend this motel to anyone for fun in the sun down the shore!

title: Sweet 16 n Toes in the Sand
text:
Iâ€™ve read some reviews and if I were still in the Corporate workforce Iâ€™d most likely have to ixnay all the whiners!!! Iâ€™ve lived in Naples, on Sanibel, worked on Captiva , and at the 5Star5Diamond Ritz Carlton Naples which prompted me to return to PSU to complete my degree in the field. I have been in the Hotel Industry over 30 years.. 20 being Corporate.
IF YOU DONT LIKE IT HEREâ€” SWALLOW THE $$$ HIT AND LEAVE. 
Dan is a good and decent dude. However I am certain he is JUST LIKE YOUâ€” human. Get snarky n itâ€™s coming right back at you!!  No, the room is not one like Atlantis but it is perfect if you are looking for a ROOM within a few hundred feet from the watching the sun rise over the water, walk to anywhere- shopping, dining out, stroll the boardwalk 
Soâ€¦ easy does it. The room, the location, the price, and DAN!!!  were perfect !!!!

title: Amazing service, amazing room, amazing staff, amazing location
text: Please stay here! From the first step in the door, you will feel like the most important person/family in the world. The room was so exciting to my 13 and 10 year olds and me and my husband as all had our own beds and they were by far the most comfortable beds in our UK tour. Our bathroom, living space and restaurant and bar experience exceeded expectations as well. You will be missing out if you donâ€™t book this hotel. The staff is first rate. Everyone we talked with was busy making sure our experience in Portree was one to remember and talk about again and again and I will. And you should too. Come here and experience for yourself.

title: Better communication with the hotels/motels
text: Booked online but decided to pay at the hotel but I put my information/ CC info to reserve my spot only to show up and THEY GAVE MY ROOM AWAY. Because of some technicality even though I had called in advanced to let them know we were running late. This is something they could work on is the communication so people arenâ€™t left stranded with nowhere to sleep! Next night I booked online but this time I payed online to make sure We had a place to sleep after a long day of driving. I call the hotel to confirm and they said I had to pay in the establishment, but I told them I had already payed ? So I ended calling customer service and they helped me thru the process! Only reason for 4 stars is because of the customer service representatives!!! You guys are awesome

title: Most hospitable hosts ever! Great apartment
text:
I wish I could leave a ten start review! 
We arrived late after a long trip from Corfu. The hosts were waiting for us at the apartment and showed us around. The apartment was spotless clean, the fridge was stocked with water, fruits and orange juice for the kids. They didnâ€™t just recommend an amazing place for dinner but also showed us the way to it. Really the kindest hosts who went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed. I was truly impressed and touched by their kindness! The apartment is also tastefully decorated with handmade furniture by the hostess. The location is perfect - just 200 meters away from Kalamitsa beach. We will definitely be back next time we travel to Greece!

title: Do not use booking
text: Been using booking for 3 years as a trucker itâ€™s very convenient too see the selection of everything In your area well I booked a hotel on my home stay was charged double yeah twice after speaking with bank too confirm which it was follow by the hotel I then called booking who then informed me as long as I provided pictures and statements that it would be refunded which I did just for them too then tell me that they seen the charge but then say they donâ€™t do any charges that I would have too wait for the hotel too post the charge which I spoke with the hotel because Iâ€™m very good friends with this hotel I stay on a regular every month which I was informed that any charges was through booking needless too say my bank has filed fraudulent statements and the hotel has sent proof too my bank so I can get refunded in the morning so thanks too booking for not caring about wrongfully taking people money

title: Muscat Hills Resorts
text:
Day 1: Upon arrival we were not even welcomed at the gate. Security was very rude even though we arrived in an airport taxi. There was not even a hotel buggy to take us to our quarters. Dinner that evening was great we had a wonderful hostess from Myanmar and in my opinion absolutely professional beyond measure. 

Day 2 : The beaches and the breakfast were wonderful. The views were simply and breathtaking. Dinner that nights was one of the worst experiences I have ever had. The hostesses were very pushy in trying to get us to place our order.  Then after that didnâ€™t work they ignored us until we had to signal them to come over. The kicker out of the whole night was their manager Ricardo. Me and my wife watched him greet every other table and guest that night twice while only glancing at us. I guess we had to either be Arab or Caucasian for him to even greet us in his Resturant. Horrible experience never would I recommend this resort to anyone.

title: Less than expected
text:
Location proximity to Oktoberfest was only good thing. Well the check-in staff were friendly enough. The place was dark and grungy with several lights out. My first room was okay, but missing furniture.
There were not adequate outlets either. I had to change rooms for my two night stay. This made me quite upset, as I was traveling for business and it meant leaving everything in luggage storage all the time. The luggage storage did not seem secure as it was in in an outside building and not monitored. It was also a ransacked mess. The breakfast, that I thought was included, was not. It was an okay assortment, but the breads did not seem fresh.
My second room was worse than the first. But at least it had all furniture. The bed was about the least comfortable I've been on in a while. All night long people were knocking on doors and making loud noises. Broken beer bottles in the hallway. It was just a mess.

title: Marriott - front desk Claimed never received reservation
text: Marriott louisville east claimed to not receive my reservation. I arrived at ~10pm family vacation driving all day. They say nkt in system it happens all the time with all 3rd party sites and sometimes gets booked under other names etc. turned us away  to find another room late nightâ€¦meanwhile i try to contact booking both phone calls which said technical glitch and disconnected and through chat which says will be responded to within â€œ24 hrsâ€. Which i never got a response. I emailed and tried to chat 2 more times no response. I then get a charge from marriott from that site. Not happy with booking their inability to provide customer service as they say they do â€œ24 hrs a dayâ€ made a nightmare of a night for my family. I understand Marriott's part as well and will be contacting them also. The 1 star is for terrible actually ZERO support for me. Very unhappy. . Never again.
